text: What’s your full name and affiliation? (e.g., 'Jane Doe — University of Calgary, UCVM')
What is your appointment type and time allocation? (e.g., clinical, teaching, research; % for each)
Briefly list your domain expertise, methods/skills, and any unique assets (e.g., specialized clinics, datasets).
What research topics are you most interested in pursuing in the next 1–3 years?
What constraints should we design around? (e.g., limited research time, lack of personnel, ethics hurdles)
Which populations, species, or systems can you access readily (e.g., patient types, farms, animal cohorts, archives)?
Who are your likely collaborators or units (local or external)? Any labs/facilities you can leverage?
What funding programs might match your interests (internal, provincial, federal, foundations)?
What outcomes would define success in 12 months? (e.g., pilot data, 1–2 grants, papers, partnerships)
